trans-unit.source: Scopes a set of <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> objects that are categorized as operating under the same protocol.
trans-unit.target: Âmbitos de um conjunto de <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> objetos que são classificados como operar sob o mesmo protocolo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> class with the specified GUID scope identification number.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> classe com o número de identificação de âmbito do GUID especificado.
Um número de identificação de âmbito GUID.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> are the same.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> e especificado <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> são os mesmos.
Um objeto de âmbito de marcadores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the bookmark scopes are the same; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os âmbitos de marcadores são os mesmos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates an identification number for the current <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um número de identificação para o atual <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID that identifies the current <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o GUID que identifica o atual <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the current <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> using the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa atual <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> utilizando o GUID especificado.
O ambiente de execução de atividade atual.

trans-unit.source: The GUID to assign to the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O GUID para atribuir ao <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"></xref> has been initialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Activities.BookmarkScope"> </xref> foi inicializado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
